mapper.select: SELECT a.stid, w.stname AS stnm, w.lasttime AS datatime, w.waterlevel AS waterlv, a.alert_value, b.message_id, b.message, array_agg(f.member_name) AS member_names, array_agg(f.phone) AS phones FROM send.send_condition a LEFT JOIN water.water_station w ON a.stid = w.stid LEFT JOIN send.presetting_message b ON a.message_id = b.message_id LEFT JOIN send.sms_organization_relation c ON a.stid = c.stid LEFT JOIN dept.organization d ON c.org_id = d.org_id LEFT JOIN send.sms_member_relation e ON d.org_id = e.org_id AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM send.sms_send_member_relation WHERE member_id = e.member_id AND stid = a.stid) LEFT JOIN dept.member f ON e.member_id = f.member_id WHERE c.org_id IS NOT NULL AND e.member_id IS NOT NULL AND w.waterlevel > a.alert_value GROUP BY a.stid, w.stname, w.lasttime, w.waterlevel, a.alert_value, b.message_id, b.message
